data.text:
Instructors

Students following the Microfluidics program are instructed by, and collaborate with, various faculty from the research institutes and universities from Paris area, such as Institut Curie (M. Piel, P. Silberzan, B. Hajj, S. Descroix, C. Villard, etc.), Sorbonne Université (J. Fattaccioli, M. Morel, S. Ognier), ENS Paris Saclay (B. Le Pioufle), ESPCI (N. Brémond, D. Quéré, etc.), Chimie Paristech (M. Tatoulian, C. Guyon, M. Zhang, S. Ognier), Ecole Normale Supérieure (M. Morel, J. Fattaccioli), Université Paris Diderot (A. Lindner), Université Paris Saclay (F. Restagno), etc.
